action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is 5 rows by 5 columns. The top row has an X in the first and last columns, and empty squares in the middle three columns. The second row has an X in the first, second, fourth, and fifth columns, and an empty square in the third column. The third row has an X in the first, third, and fifth columns, and empty squares in the second and fourth columns. The fourth and fifth rows have an X in the first column, empty squares in the second, third, and fourth columns, and an X in the fifth column.

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 grid with X's and empty squares. The top row has an X on each end and empty squares in the middle. The second row is the same as the first. The third row has an X on each end and in the middle, with empty squares on either side of the middle X. The fourth row has X's on each end and in the second and fourth positions, with an empty square in the middle. The fifth row is the same as the first.

The third row has an X in the first, third, and fifth columns, and empty squares in the second and fourth columns. The fourth and fifth rows have an X in the first column, empty squares in the second, third, and fourth columns, and an X in the fifth column.

QUESTION: Does your grid have any rows where all the squares are empty?
